falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Per-evidence mandatory critics may be unnecessary or prohibitively expensive.
falsificationQueries: Check if paper.md requires per-evidence probes or only aggregate calibration
Inspect current scoring/probing to infer intended granularity
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Paper stresses expert-agreement calibration but does not specify per-evidence requirement; user mandate overrides for this refactor. Cost impact remains a risk.
